supportcontacts.supportcontact: Ricoh and OEM Forum on OpenPrinting

shortdescription.en: Free software printer driver for the SAG-GDI protocol on Ricoh lasers

comments.en:
This is a simple CUPS Raster driver (written in Python) to generate the proprietary SAG-GDI raster format from Sagem Communication which is used by some l;aser printers from Ricoh, currently the Aficio SP1000s and SP1100s. These printers do not understand PCL or PostScript and atre therefore no covered by Ricoh's PPD files.

Note that this driver is not supplied by Ricoh.
